__e: If it hadn't been for Larry, I don't know what I would have done.

Oh, well, yes I am, but Larry is just like a brother.
Larry, what did you do to her that eight years later, she's still-
Larry, what has that got to do with our moving to the country?
And don't give me that " Larry, what are you doing here?" routine.
